page.title: 20 CREDITS
page.content:
Antony School wishes to acknowledge the help given by the following people in the compilation of this survey:
Mr S.Madge for work on natural history Mr J.Kingston for work on Ferry History Mr R.Carew-Pole for visit to Antony House. Captain R.Brown and 3rd Officer WRNS J.Sitter for visit to H.M.S Raleigh Lady Boyd for visit to Ince Castle Mr J.Woodfield for photography Numerous parents for help with transport and area surveying And of course the children of Class 1 Antony C.E.V.A. School Summer Term 1985
